Handling of Personal Information

Personal Information Protection Policy

Ruzo Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") recognizes that protecting the personal information of all individuals (hereinafter referred to as "data subjects"), including customers who use our website and those who provide personal information to us, is an important responsibility. We establish the following handling policy and strive to protect personal information.

1. Definition of Personal Information

In this Privacy Policy, "personal information" refers to information that can identify an individual, such as name, address, gender, date of birth, phone number, email address, user ID, password, interests, and other details provided through our publications and website.

2. Use of Personal Information

2-1 Member and User Management
  • Implementation of campaigns and surveys
  • Advertising, promotion, and sales solicitation of our products
  • Distribution of email newsletters
  • Notification of important matters regarding this website
  • Billing and fee calculation
  • Publication of information posted by members and users
2-2 Development
  • Handling various inquiries and after-sales services
  • Publication of information posted by members and users
  • Creation of statistical data for service improvement
  • Exercise of rights or fulfillment of obligations based on contracts or laws

3. Management of Personal Information

We strictly manage the personal information provided to us and strive to protect it by implementing appropriate security measures in accordance with laws, guidelines, and internal regulations to prevent unauthorized access, loss, destruction, alteration, and leakage. We also educate our employees on the proper handling of personal information and make every effort to ensure its protection.

4. Disclosure, Correction, and Deletion of Personal Information

If you wish to disclose, correct, or delete the personal information you have provided, we will only do so after verifying your identity by asking for certain details such as your email address and date of birth. The Company will not disclose, correct, or delete your information to third parties without your prior consent.

5. Provision of Personal Information

The personal information you provide may be disclosed in the following cases:

  • When consent is given by the data subject
  • When required by law


Contact Information for Personal Information Protection Policy

The Company may change the content of this personal information handling policy without prior notice due to business needs, new laws, amendments to existing laws, or other circumstances. Any changes will be announced on this website. Please check the latest version of this page when using our services.

For requests or inquiries regarding the handling of personal information or retained personal data, please contact us through the inquiry form.

Date of Enactment: 2024/07/02

Company Name: Ruzo Co., Ltd.
